reviews.review_msg: She felt almost like a friend to the majority of the class and was hilarious at times. Very approachable, understanding and likes student feedback. I think she gave everyone a 10/10 for presentations which was nice. She is very flexible as she extended the deadline for our final paper.

I've never met a prof that cares so much about her student's success. She got 3 students in the class published, organized the undergraduate research symposium, and genuinely cares about every student as a person and as a learner. Also, she is HILARIOUS and a great person to be around. Definitely a prof I'm happy I didn't miss out on.
